special_abilities.name: Dive Attack.
descriptions: If the quetzalcoatlus is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage to the target.

special_abilities.name: Flyby.
descriptions: The quetzalcoatlus doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (3d6+2) piercing damage.
